de.weltraumschaf.jebnf.gfx.shapes
Interface AdjustableShape

All Known Subinterfaces:
GridShape, SequenceShape, TextShape
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractCompundShape, AbstractTextShape, ChoiceShape, ColumnLayoutShape, GridLayoutShape, IdentifierShape, LoopShape, OptionShape, RowLayoutShape, RuleShape, TerminalShape
public interface AdjustableShape

Implementors can adjust their size and/or position.

Author:
Sven Strittmatter

Method Summary
 void adjust(Graphics2D graphic)
          Recalculates the dimension and position of the implementor.
 

Method Detail

adjust

void adjust(Graphics2D graphic)
Recalculates the dimension and position of the implementor. Compound adjustable which contains other adjustable may need to invoke this method recursively.

Parameters:
graphic - Graphic context used for font measuring.
